action.action-desc: Mr. Miller of Ohio introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to ensure access of Armed Forces recruiters to secondary school campuses, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensuring Military Recruitment Access Act.

subsection.text: Section 8528(a)(3) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7908(a)(3)) is amended by inserting (including access to the campus of such secondary school) for the same amount of time after secondary school students.
Section 8528(b) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7908(b)) is amended to read as follows:

The Secretary, in consultation with the Secretary of Defense, shall, not later than 120 days after the date of the enactment of this subsection and annually thereafter, notify school leaders, school administrators, and other educators aboutâ€”

paragraph.text: the requirements of this section; and
actions that may be taken to enforce the requirements of this section.
